name: The Global Network
slogan: Pairing international Business School Graduates with fast growing Startups
description:
The Global Network is an international relocation and recruitment company that pairs some of the best Global Business school graduates with fast growing startups in different cities. 

Our partnerships include top international business schools such as HEC Paris, Cranfield School of Management, IE Business School, INSEAD, ESSEC Business School, London Business School and many others. 

Through this we have access to some top International talent and fit them with growing business's in London, Edinburgh and Dublin so they can use their skills and experience to help them develop and succeed.

team.name: Shauna Rodgers
team.bioHtml: Strategic, customer focused sales professional, experienced at using a consultative approach to build relationships, grow brands and develop opportunities.

jobs.title: Sales Director/ Head of Recruitment at International Startup
jobs.description:
About the Role

You'll be working alongside the Founder to help contribute to and execute the business strategy and grow the business. Your role will be to help form the growth strategy, gain new clients and grow and close new business.

You will be one of the first to join the company so will be able to shape the role, your team and the business. 

Responsibilities

- Help manage the recruitment side of the business, building relationships with new Startups and managing relations with current Startup clients. 
- Grow the network of Startups that the Global Network has partnerships with. 
- Contribute to any growth strategies and new verticals that could be explored. 
- Attend events to increase brand awareness and gain new clients. 
- Put forward ideas for new ways to increase brand awareness and grow. 

About you

The ideal candidate will have:
1. An entrepreneurial drive, dynamic personality and vision about where they can take the business.
2. Connections in the Startup market.
3. An International mindset that fits with the values of the company.
4. Great interpersonal and communication skills.
5. Ambition and desire to be part of a growing business.
6. The ability to work independently.
7. Previous recruitment experience would be highly beneficial. 
 

This is a remote role that could be extremely flexible for the right person and can be part-time, full time or a contract role. 

Extremely generous commission structure and high equity offer can be discussed.

Please get in touch with any questions to info@theglobal-network.com.

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
About the role

We’re looking for a creative, passionate and driven Marketing Intern who would like exposure to an International start-up environment. 

You'll be working alongside the Founder to help create and execute the marketing and growth strategy for the new company. Your role will be focused on content creation, marketing growth strategy and community management.
You will be one of the first to join the company so will be able to shape the role and the direction of the business at an exciting time.  

Responsibilities:

- Contribute to the marketing strategies to help increase brand awareness and gain new clients.

- Prepare content for blogs and social media posts, brochures, mail campaigns and the website.

- Help in developing the brand positioning and overall marketing strategy for the business.

- Social media marketing- using a variety of channels - Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn to promote the business.

- Monitor analytics on social media channels and web to increase customer and prospect engagement.

- Conduct research to capture market trends and outline the competitive landscape.

- Collaborate with other team members to refine and improve our offering, our message, and our customer service.


About you

The ideal candidate will be:

1. Passionate about marketing.
2. Organised, self-driven, and accountable.
3. Fluent in English with excellent verbal and written communication skills.
4. Interested in entrepreneurship and startups.
5. Excited to create content and have a love of writing.
6. Proactive and take initiative to find solutions of problems.
7. Internationally minded with an ability to work across different markets and reach international audiences.

Benefits:
- Real experience in Marketing for a growing brand.
- Opportunity to make a lasting impact on the company.
- Flexible schedule.
- Remote (work anywhere with internet access).


We can be flexible and help work the role around you in order to suit your skills and needs.

If an internship is part of your course of study we are happy to fit with any of your school’s specific internship guidelines to ensure you receive your credit. 
We can also help with a professional development project that can be used to demonstrate your skill set and work completed and are happy to provide references for any future work. 



There is also potential for a full time, paid position depending on performance.
